title: OpenTelemetry Security
description:
Enables the security layer needed to use OpenTelemetry through the Internet, like pushing data to a SaaS provider.

See: https://www.krakend.io/docs/telemetry/opentelemetry-security/

otlp.title: OTLP exporters
otlp.description:
The list of OTLP exporters that require authentication. Set at least one object to push metrics and traces to an external collector using OTLP.

See: https://www.krakend.io/docs/telemetry/opentelemetry-security/

headers.title: Headers
headers.description:
The custom headers you will send to authenticate requests. Each key is the header name you will add to all outgoing reports.

See: https://www.krakend.io/docs/telemetry/opentelemetry-security/

.*.title: Header value
.*.description: The value of the header, usually an API token.

name.title: Name
name.description:
The **exact name** you used to define the exporter under `telemetry/opentelemetry`.

See: https://www.krakend.io/docs/telemetry/opentelemetry-security/
